## Story Consistency

- [ ] CHK001 Timeline of events is internally consistent
- [ ] CHK002 Character ages match throughout
- [ ] CHK003 Geographic distances/travel times are plausible

## Character Consistency

- [ ] CHK004 Character voices remain distinct
- [ ] CHK005 Character motivations are consistent with their arcs
- [ ] CHK006 Physical descriptions don't contradict earlier mentions

## Plot & Structure

- [ ] CHK007 All planted seeds/foreshadowing pay off
- [ ] CHK008 No dangling plot threads
- [ ] CHK009 Pacing maintains appropriate tension

## World-Building

- [ ] CHK010 Magic/technology rules are followed consistently
- [ ] CHK011 Cultural details remain accurate
- [ ] CHK012 Setting descriptions don't contradict
